messages.message:
In deployment config, can we switch to our adopted style of indicating required fields with an asterisk, rather than using the parenthetical optional?
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C03HVPWB7HR/p1726166831491279?thread_ts=1722626087.150899&cid=C03HVPWB7HR

Also, is it just me, or is the typeface on this page way huge?
cc: @Jessica I think?
@Jianqi Xing for the type face - I think it looks okay though! Our issue is that we need a pretty large set of different sizes to show hierarchy, so there needs to be some variation

So the required fields here are Name, App, and Workspace. Those aren't all form fields, so we need to figure out where we'd want to put the asterisks. And we probably only want to show them when we're in edit mode. So on the field for name, on the select for workspace, and then where do you all think it should go for app?
